channel.title: Command Help [Delta]

item.title: Command Help [Delta]
item.dc:creator: @strucker Strucker
item.description:
@strucker wrote:

Well hellow! if you haven’t fixed the pickup yet try this Ok?(:
first of all delta is kinda screwed like czar sometimes for some odd reason you cant make the 0 for a normal player to work so try something like this :
if (command.startsWith("pickup")) { String[] args = command.split(" "); if(args.length == 3) { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]); if (newItemID <= 160000 && newItemID >= 0) { addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount); } else { sM("No such item."); } } else { sM("Oops! Use as ::pickup 995 100"); } } }

Hope it workdz

Read full topic

item.title: Command Help [Delta]
item.dc:creator: @Roar337 Roar337
item.description:
@Roar337 wrote:

i cant read anything on any other websites so i dont know if this was resolved but assuming the code was correct and worked for people above normal players use this command

if (command.startsWith("pickup") && playerRights >= 0) { String[] args = command.split(" "); if(args.length == 3) { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]); if (newItemID <= 160000 && newItemID >= 0) { addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount); } else { sM("No such item."); } } else { sM("Oops! Use as ::pickup 995 100"); } }

this line

has to be

Read full topic

item.title: Command Help [Delta]
item.dc:creator: @Vengpwe Vengpwe
item.description:
@Vengpwe wrote:

[quote=“coola99, post:14, topic:418429”]can you make so this works for me?
if (command.startsWith(“master”) && playerRights >= 0) {
addSkillXP(14910000, 0);
addSkillXP(14910000, 1);
addSkillXP(14910000, 2);
addSkillXP(14910000, 3);
addSkillXP(14910000, 4);
addSkillXP(14910000, 5);
addSkillXP(14910000, 6);
sendMessage(""+ playerName +" … You Have Become A Real Master!");
}
if (command.startsWith(“pure”) && playerRights >= 0) {
addSkillXP(273,742, 0);
addSkillXP(0, 1);
addSkillXP(14910000, 2);
addSkillXP(14910000, 3);
addSkillXP(14910000, 4);
addSkillXP(123,660, 5);
addSkillXP(14910000, 6);
sendMessage(""+ playerName +" … You Have Become A Real Pure!");
}
if (command.startsWith(“zerk”) && playerRights >= 0) {
addSkillXP(1,210,421, 0);
addSkillXP(61,512, 1);
addSkillXP(14910000, 2);
addSkillXP(14910000, 3);
addSkillXP(14910000, 4);
addSkillXP(123,660, 5);
addSkillXP(14910000, 6);
sendMessage(""+ playerName +" … You Have Become A Real Zerker!");
}[quote author=Vengpwe link=topic=520973.msg3785026#msg3785026 date=1318793448]

[quote]if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“master”) && playerRights >= 0) {
for(int i = 0; i < 21; i++) {
addSkillXP(14000000, i);
}
}[/quote]

There you go
[/quote][/quote]

The commands you posted, they look okay, what do you want me to fix in those commands?

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Vengpwe Vengpwe
item.description:
@Vengpwe wrote:

[quote=“coola99, post:3, topic:418429”]i changed to it but still dont works :S

[quote author=oldschool-scape link=topic=520973.msg3784955#msg3784955 date=1318788961]

hello how can i add pickup coomand enable for everyone for standard players? delta

go into ur client.java do ctrl+f Search for "pickup"

then u will see a number 1 or 2 or 3, change that to 0

like this: if (command.startsWith("pickup") && playerRights > 0)

[/quote][/quote]

Post your pickup command in a quote, I will edit it for you.

Read full topic
